T02n2998u_001:983: The mahāśmaśānasaṁcāra 1st Day tato dvitīyakṛṣṇapakṣe pratipaddine 'rdharātrāt prathamaprahare kulikāyāḥ pūrvasmin mahāśmaśāne saṁcāraḥ |

T02n2998u_001:989: tataḥ sthānavaśāt kākāsyāku- likā ulūkāsyā bhavati |

T02n2998u_001:995: tataś caturthaprahare śvānāsyākulikāyā uttaramahāśma- śāne saṁcāraḥ |

T02n2998u_001:1013: tataś caturthaprahare yama- daṁṣṭriṇyāḥ kulikāyā āgneyamahāśmaśāne saṁcāraḥ |
T02n2998u_001:1018: evaṁ prathamadine yoginīnāṁ saṁcāro vedi- tavyaḥ |

T02n2998u_001:1359: tataḥ svasvasthānavaśād airāvatyādayaḥ sva- svarūpadhāriṇyo bhavanti |
T02n2998u_001:1360: iti kuṇḍalādakṣiṇāvartena caturyoginīnāṁ lagnārdhabhedena saṁcāro vākcakre |

T02n2998u_001:1373: iha karkaṭodaye kāyacakrapūrvārāc cakravegāyā dakṣiṇāre saṁcāraḥ khaṇḍarohāyāḥ paścimāre śauṇḍinyā uttarāre cakravarmiṇyāḥ pūrvāre |
T02n2998u_001:1374: tataḥ sthānavaśāc cakravegā khaṇḍarohā bhavati khaṇḍarohā śauṇḍinī śauṇḍinī cakravarmiṇi cakravarmiṇī cakravegā bhavati |
T02n2998u_001:1375: tataḥ kar- kaṭārdhe pūrvacakravegāyāḥ paścimāre saṁcāraḥ pūrvakhaṇ- ḍarohāyā uttarāre pūrvaśauṇḍinyāḥ pūrvāre pūrvacakravarmiṇyā dakṣiṇāre saṁcāraḥ

T02n2998u_001:1378: tataḥ sthānavaśāt pūrvacakravegā cakravarmiṇī bhavati pūrvakhaṇḍarohā cakravegā pūrvaśauṇḍinī khaṇḍarohā pūrvacakravarmiṇī śauṇḍinī bhavati

T02n2998u_001:1382: tataḥ pūjāṁ kṛtvā vāmāvartena saṁcāraḥ kartavyaḥ |

T02n2998u_001:1411: caturviṁśatiyoginīnāṁ saṁcāraḥ kartavyaḥ vṛśikā- didvādaśārdhalagne caturviṁśatikālabhedair yogibhir gaṇacakre |

T02n2998u_001:1420: yathā laukikasamvṛtyā akulīnā api cakravarti- ratnacchatratale snāpitāḥ santyāḥ kulīnā bhavanti brāhmanādīnāṁ |
T02n2998u_001:1421: yathā eva viśvāmitrādayaḥ śvapacyādigarbhasaṁbhūtā akulīnā mantradhyā- natapobalena brāhmaṇā babhūvus tathā kulināpi brāhmaṇā gomāṁsādikaṁ bhuktvā caṇḍālādyakulīnāṁ ca gṛhe bhuktvā akulīnā bhavanti |

T02n2998u_001:1423: evaṁ trivarṣaṁ yāvat pūjāmantrajāpadhyānaṁ kṛtvā mantrajāpāvasāne homam |

T02n2998u_001:1446: teṣāṁ caturvaktrānāṁ svabhāvenottaradakṣiṇapūrvāparacakrāreṣu sthi- tāḥ ṣaṭtriṁśaḍḍākinyaḥ |

T02n2998u_001:1452: (52) bāhye 'ṣṭasu mahāśmaśāneṣu pūrvaśmaśāne śūṁkārapariṇataṁ śavā- sanaṁ kākāsyāyā adhyātmani mukhanāḍyāṁ prāṇavāyor nirodha it |

T02n2998u_001:1459: bāhye uṁkārapariṇatam āgneye yamamathanyā adhyātmani vāmanetranāḍyāṁ prāṇavāyor nirodhaḥ |
T02n2998u_001:1460: ity aṣṭamahāśmaśānāsanāni kākāsyādīnāṁ veditavyāni bāhye gaṇacakre ||
T02n2998u_001:1461: idānīṁ pracaṇḍādīnāṁ sthānanāmādibījapariṇatāny āsanāny ucyante cittavākkāyacakre iha bāhye cittacakre pūrvāropari pūṁkārapari- ṇataṁ śavam āsanaṁ pracaṇḍāyā adhyātmani dharmacakre pūrvaṇāḍyāṁ prāṇanirodho nītārthena |
T02n2998u_001:1463: evaṁ bāhye dakṣiṇāre jāṁkārapariṇataṁ śavam caṇḍākṣyā adhyātmani dakṣiṇanāḍyāṁ nirodhaḥ prāṇasyeti nītārthena |

T02n2998u_001:2490: evaṁ rāgavirāgābhyāṁ trailokyam asamāhitaṁ vyākulīkṛtam iti |
T02n2998u_001:2492: atraiva prajñāsaṅge sevādikaṁ bhagavatā tantrāntareṣūktam tathā |
T02n2998u_001:2498: evaṁ bodhicittabindusamayān pālayet sādhakaḥ susamāhita iti bhaga- vato niyamaḥ ||
T02n2998u_001:2499: (98) Chapter XX The Eight Great Pledges (aṣṭasamayāḥ)
T02n2998u_001:2502: siddhīnāṁ kāraṇaṁ nityaṁ samayānāṁ tu pālanam |
T02n2998u_001:2506: ākrośo nāḍīsaṁcāra ity aṣṭau samayāḥ smṛtāḥ |
T02n2998u_001:2507: etān yaḥ pālayen nityaṁ sa śīghraṁ siddhim āpnuyāt ||
T02n2998u_001:2511: iha siddhīnāṁ karmamu- drājñānamudrāmahāmudrāsiddhīnāṁ tisṛṇāṁ kāraṇaṁ bodhicittaṁ nityaṁ hetuḥ kāmāvacararūpāvacarasamyakṣaṁbuddhaphalāptaye 'cyutaṁ bodhicittam iti prathamaḥ samayaḥ |
T02n2998u_001:2514: pūrvoktavidhānena teṣāṁ kaṇṭhe hṛdaye nābhau guhye āgatānāṁ prajñārāgadrutānāṁ tu ṣoḍaśānandātmakānāṁ teṣāṁ pālanaṁ rakṣaṇaṁ yogināṁ dvitīyaḥ samayaḥ |
T02n2998u_001:2516: iha kulikāṁ tyaktvā bāhyasiddhyarthaṁ ḍākinyādikām anyatathāgatakulodbhūtāṁ na bhāvayed iti nītārthas tṛtīyaḥ samayaḥ |
T02n2998u_001:2521: mayānāṁ ceṣṭitaṁ ṣoḍaśānandarūpam apratihataṁ kṛṣṇapakṣe na praviṣṭam iti pañcamaḥ samayaḥ |
T02n2998u_001:2524: tasyāś caryā bodhisattvānām anekadhā sattvārthaṁ prati |
T02n2998u_001:2527: manthānaṁ sukhacittaṁ sadā bodhisattvānām iti ṣaṣṭhaḥ samayaḥ |
T02n2998u_001:2529: iha vajramukhe ānane sadā acyutaśīlaḥ saptamaḥ samayaḥ |
T02n2998u_001:2531: adho gatānāṁ bodhicittabindunāṁ nāḍīsaṁcāre 'vadhūtīkhagamukhāsaṁcāre gatānāṁ vajramaṇer ākrośa ākarṣaṇaṁ guhye nābhau hṛdaye kaṇṭhe lalāṭe karṇikāt karṇikāsaṁcāre ūrdhvagamanaṁ retasa ity aṣṭamaḥ samayaḥ |
T02n2998u_001:2533: etān yaḥ pālayen nityaṁ sarvakālaṁ sa siddhiṁ mahāmudrāsiddhiṁ śighram āpnuyād ity adhyātmasamayapālanam ||
T02n2998u_001:2536: bāhyasiddhīnām akaniṣṭhabhuvana- paryantaṁ kāraṇaṁ nityaṁ bodhicittotpādadānādipuṇyasaṁbhāra iti prathamaḥ samayaḥ |
T02n2998u_001:2537: samayānāṁ pālanam iti samayā bāhye madyaṁ go kvādikam avarṇābhigamanaṁ pañcāmṛtāsvādanam |
T02n2998u_001:2539: yadi kartavyaṁ tadā- tiguptam iti dvitīyaḥ samayaḥ |
T02n2998u_001:2542: tām anyakulodbhūtāṁ bauddhasamayadūṣakīṁ tathānyāṁ samaya rahitāṁ na kāmayed iti |
T02n2998u_001:2543: kāmalaulyato yadi kāmayet tadā laukikasiddhihānir bhavati samayaviheṭhanād iti tṛtīyaḥ samayaḥ |
T02n2998u_001:2545: advaitaṁ bodhicittāsvādanaṁ dūtikāvīrayoḥ sukham caikakāle iti caturthaḥ samayaḥ |
T02n2998u_001:2547: apratihataṁ sevitānāṁ samayānāṁ ceṣṭitaṁ mantrasiddhyādispharaṇaṁ devānām (100)
T02n2998u_001:2548: apratihataṁ vighanair na hantuṁ śakyata it pañcamaḥ samayaḥ |
T02n2998u_001:2550: nārī sarvavarṇasaṁbhūtā tasyāś caryā bahuvidhāś cumbanāliṅganādikāḥ |
T02n2998u_001:2555: ānana iti vajramukhe veditavyaṁ cyavanakāle iti saptamaḥ samayaḥ |
T02n2998u_001:2556: ākrośo nāḍīsaṁcāra iti lalanārasanāmadhyasaṁcāre bodhicittasyākrośa iti tasya grahaṇaṁ jarārogādyapanayanārthaṁ samayasevanārtham ity aṣṭamaḥ samayaḥ |
T02n2998u_001:2562: (101) Chapter XXI The Breaking of Pledges Commentary on CS 11AB idānīṁ samayabhedena siddhihānir ucyate bhedenetyādinā |
T02n2998u_001:2565: teṣāṁ bhakṣaṇena pañcavarṇābhigamanena mātṛbhaginyādisvagotranāryabhigamanena yadi bhedo bhavati tadā samayabhedaḥ |
T02n2998u_001:2566: tena samayabhedena lokāvadhyānaṁ bhaved deśaku- lavyavahāreṇa lokāvadhyānena śāsane nindā bhavati |
T02n2998u_001:2568: pāpaprabhāvāt puṇyahāniḥ puṇyābhāvāt siddhitrayasya hānir bhavati |
T02n2998u_001:2569: evaṁ bhedena samayānāṁ tu neṣṭasiddhir avāphyate yogibhir bāhyasamayabhedeneti niyamaḥ |
T02n2998u_001:2573: virāgo nāma pāpam pāpād duḥkhasaṁbhava iti |
T02n2998u_001:2574: evaṁ samayabhedena neṣṭasiddhir mahāmudrāsiddhir avāpyate yogibhir iti |
T02n2998u_001:2575: tathā paramādibuddhe sekoddeśe bhagavān āha- cyuter virāgasaṁbhūtir virāgād duḥkhasaṁbhavaḥ |
T02n2998u_001:2576: duḥkhād dhātukṣayaḥ puṁsāṁ kṣayān mṛtyur iti smṛtaḥ ||
T02n2998u_001:2578: na virāgāt paraṁ pāpaṁ puṇyaṁ na sukhataḥ param |
T02n2998u_001:2580: iti punaḥ samayaparicchede patite bodhicitte 'smin sarvasiddhinidhānake |
T02n2998u_001:2581: mūrchite skandhavijñāne siddhiṁ prāpnoti na vratī ||
T02n2998u_001:2583: (102) evaṁ sarvatantrarāje samayabhedaniṣedho bāhye 'dhyātmany api bhagavatoktaḥ |
T02n2998u_001:2584: iha yadā bāhye devatānāṁ saumyaraudrāṇāṁ sādhanaṁ kartavyaṁ yoginā tadā teṣāṁ samayāḥ sevanīyāḥ |
T02n2998u_001:2585: anyathā 'nyasamaye- nānyakriyayā na sidhyanti sādhakānāṁ mṛtyudā bhavanti tantrokta- vidhirahitānām iti |
T02n2998u_001:2587: yadā bāhyasamayāḥ kartavyāḥ sekādike dine 'tyantasuguptena kartavyāḥ |
T02n2998u_001:2589: bhikṣūṇāṁ punaḥ sekakāle 'py na deyāś cīvaradhāriṇām |
T02n2998u_001:2592: teṣāṁ cittot- pādo mahāyāne kāyavācoś ca saṁyamo dātavyaḥ |
T02n2998u_001:2593: yathā śrāva- kaśikṣā tathā kāyena vacasā pālanīyā iti samayapālanā kartavyā bhikṣubhir |
T02n2998u_001:2595: cīvare tyakte sati kāyavākcittakṛtena samayānuṣṭhānena karmamudrāsamarpaṇenābhiṣeko bhikṣūṇāṁ deyaḥ prakaṭavajrācāryapadalābhāya |
T02n2998u_001:2597: Conclusion iha lakṣābhidhānād uddhṛte laghutantre 'smiṁl laukikalokottara- siddhisādhako 'bhiṣekādisarvasamayārthaḥ piṇḍīkṛtaḥ |
T02n2998u_001:2598: athāto ra- hasyaṁ vakṣya ityādinā neṣṭasiddhir avāpyata iti paryantaṁ sārdha- daśagāthābhiḥ sarvatantrārthaḥ paramaguhyatamaḥ saṁdhyā- bhāṣāntareṇa tantratantrāntareṇa boddhavyaḥ sadgurūpade- śena mahāmudrāsiddhikāṁkṣibhir iti |
T02n2998u_001:2599: evaṁ sarvalaghu- tantroktārthaḥ pradhānamūlatantreṇa bodhisattvakṛtaṭīkayā vā ṣaṭko- ṭyarthadeśakyā deśāntaraṁ dakṣiṇottaraṁ gatvā sarvam etaj jñātavy- am |
T02n2998u_001:2600: na punaḥ paṇḍitābhimānaiḥ kṛtaṭīkayā guhyārtho vitanyate (103)
T02n2998u_001:2602: iha laghutantraṭīkāyāṁ saṁkṣepeṇa piṇ- ḍārthaḥ prakaṭīkṛto vistaratantraṭīkāyāṁ vistareṇāvagantavyo vīryavadbhir iti bhagavato niyamaḥ ||
T02n2998u_001:2603: iti lakṣābhidhānād uddhṛte laghvabhidhāne piṇḍārthavivaraṇaṁ nāma prathamaṭīkāparicchedaḥ ||
